actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to provide estimates of the use of taxpayer funds by the United States Government, and for other purposes.
subjects: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

summary.text: This bill requires the Department of the Treasury to provide to each taxpayer a one-page estimate of how such taxpayer's money was spent by the government during the immediately preceding calendar year.
